Weâ€™ll be using Idyll to do some web-dev and we need to install another package manager, npm, to install Idyll and other Idyll-related packages.

Please follow these installation instructions to install the necessary packages.

Data

The GDP dataset (online)

GDP dataset from FRED (stored online for easy linking in Starboard)

The Mobility dataset (online)

A dataset of USA "mobility" which (I think comes from a a large census study from 1989-2015) and is collected in several places including right here. Here "mobility" is refering to how easy it is for a person to move up in economic status (more info can be found here) based on factors like parental income, location, race, etc.

Assignments

Jekyll & Page Installation Instructions

Install Jekyll & required pages for creating your own interactive website
